snippet.title: Creature Keeper Launch Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Graffiti Games and Fervir are delighted to announce the launch date of Creature Keeper, the passion project of solo developer Fervir, will launch on May 8th, 2025 for PC on Steam. Creature Keeper is an RPG Creature Collector game where you’ll encounter strange characters, customize your party on the go, and fight alongside your creatures in real time.
Wishlist Creature Keeper on Steam: http://bit.ly/3DGqWSi

-
Graffiti Games believes in Indie Forever, and we’re proud to be part of the indie space alongside all of you. Integrity, fun, and cultivating incredible creatives is what we live for.

Website - http://www.graffitigames.com/
X - https://x.com/Graffiti_Games
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/graffiti_games/
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@graffitigames
Graffiti Games Steam Page - https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/graffiti
